        Helper method to generate logvalues

        boolean checkEndGame()

      • handleGameOver

        private void handleGameOver(boolean policeIsWinner,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> winningPlayers)
        Handle game over: Switch game state to endState and EPlayerWon to endState with the winners.
        Parameters:
        policeIsWinner - True, if police team is winner
        winningPlayers - List with all winning players names
